macroSpec.gloss: TEI figures and tables DTD fragment
macroSpec.desc: controls the inclusion, in the DTD, of element and attribute declarations for figures, formulae, notated music, and tables.
図，表，式向けの要素宣言と属性宣言を，DTDに埋め込む制御を行う．

remarks.p: To include elements and attributes for figures, formulae, notated music, and tables in the DTD, the user should declare this entity with a value of INCLUDE; this will override the default.
図，表，式向けの要素と属性をDTDに組み込むには，当該エンティティ 宣言の値をINCLUDEとする必要がある．これにより，デフォルト値 は上書きされる．
